ModMetaData.name: XenoMonsters - Monster Genes
ModMetaData.author: Dezo The Demon of Madness
ModMetaData.description:
There's nothing particularly interesting about this mod; it simply adds genes that give or change certain characteristics, such as better wound healing, better immunity, better movement speed, and so on.
In addition, the mod adds some genes that give or change characteristics from the Combat Extended mod. By type, genes that change weapon reload speed.
I don't know how this mod will develop, or if it will develop at all. It's up to fate to decide.
<color=#990007>Installing</color> <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> <color=#990007>is not necessary, but then some genes will be useless.</color>
